Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2015 08:58AM GrandmaJ wrote: Thanks for your feedback Worried31female. I'm praying for good results for you also. I hate the waiting but there's nothing else we can do. Hang in there. ....
Posts.Title: Confused GrandmaJ Worried31female

Posts.Content: GrandmaJ wrote: I had a mammo in march and it was clear. I've had pain in the left breast for about a month. I didn't feel any lumps, but i went to my Dr this week just to be sure. He found a lump behind the nipple. I also felt it. He ordered an ultra sound which came back normal. I am waiting for the official results to be sent to him. In the meantime, i definitely have something in there that's causing pain. I have a history of breast cancer in my family, my mom and sister. I'm told that the next step is a diagnostic mammo. Does this sound right? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Confused GrandmaJ Worried31female
